name: A Little Bit of...Magic Made Fun: Funny Face
synopsis: Impress your friends with mesmerising magic using A Little Bit of... Magic Made Fun – a collection of easy-to-perform tricks that you can carry wherever you go! Did you know that the Nintendo DSi system can read minds? Astound your audience with the Funny Face trick when the smiley face you sketch on the Touch Screen speaks the name of a secretly-chosen card. Only you will know its secret! Also included is the bonus trick Vanishing Card. Picture one of the five random cards on the screen and the Nintendo DSi system will tell you which card you’re thinking of! Please note that elements of this software may have been featured in previously-released software.
